title: Melania won't join Trump in customary White House meeting: 'Bidens are disgusting'
content: Melania Trump declined Jill Biden's invitation for tea at the White House as their husbands meet for the customary post-election lunch. Melania reportedly cited a scheduling conflict but sources suggested Melania's decision stems from her strong disapproval of the Bidens following the FBI search of Mar-a-Lago as part of the government's investigation into classified documents.
summary: Melania Trump declined Jill Biden's invitation for tea at the White House as their husbands meet for the customary post-election lunch. Melania reportedly cited a scheduling conflict but sources suggested Melania's decision stems from her strong disapproval of the Bidens following the FBI search of Mar-a-Lago as part of the government's investigation into classified documents.

title: Video of Indonesian President congratulating Trump on election win goes viral
content: Indonesian President Prabowo Subianto, advocating for a neutral foreign policy, congratulated Donald Trump on his electoral success in a phone call. During the call, Trump boasted about his win and acknowledged an assassination attempt during his campaign. The call took place before Prabowo's meeting with President Biden in Washington, where he also encouraged investments from US corporations.
summary: Indonesian President Prabowo Subianto, advocating for a neutral foreign policy, congratulated Donald Trump on his electoral success in a phone call. During the call, Trump boasted about his win and acknowledged an assassination attempt during his campaign. The call took place before Prabowo's meeting with President Biden in Washington, where he also encouraged investments from US corporations.

title: How hankering for orange juice got this North Carolina woman 250,000 dollars
content: Spahr’s plan was simply to grab orange juice, but the new lottery tickets at the shop caught her eye. "When I noticed they had new tickets at the petrol station, I thought I’d give it a try," she said. She chose a $20 “Merry Multiplier” scratch-off ticket, partly because it had a foldable part that piqued her curiosity. Her odds of winning the top prize? Approximately 1 in 1.2 million – a slim chance, yet one that changed her life.
summary: Spahr’s plan was simply to grab orange juice, but the new lottery tickets at the shop caught her eye. "When I noticed they had new tickets at the petrol station, I thought I’d give it a try," she said. She chose a $20 “Merry Multiplier” scratch-off ticket, partly because it had a foldable part that piqued her curiosity. Her odds of winning the top prize? Approximately 1 in 1.2 million – a slim chance, yet one that changed her life.

title: Short cut to feminism: How an assault changed Korean woman's outlook
content: Aspiring South Korean writer On Ji-goo never considered herself a feminist but changed her mind after being physically attacked by a man for having short hair. "When I first heard that having short hair meant you were a feminist, I found it absurd," On said.
summary: Aspiring South Korean writer On Ji-goo never considered herself a feminist but changed her mind after being physically attacked by a man for having short hair. "When I first heard that having short hair meant you were a feminist, I found it absurd," On said.

title: What is 4B movement and why are American women advocating it after Trump's win
content: Originating in South Korea, the "4B" movement, advocating against dating, sex, marriage, and childbearing with men, is gaining global traction. Sparked by gender inequality concerns, the movement resonates with American women following Trump's election and anxieties surrounding women's rights. This trend reflects a broader shift where women are challenging traditional roles and demanding societal change.
summary: Originating in South Korea, the "4B" movement, advocating against dating, sex, marriage, and childbearing with men, is gaining global traction. Sparked by gender inequality concerns, the movement resonates with American women following Trump's election and anxieties surrounding women's rights. This trend reflects a broader shift where women are challenging traditional roles and demanding societal change.

title: China military displays upgraded Z-20 helicopter at Zhuhai air show
content: China unveiled its advanced Z-20 helicopter at an air show, showcasing its potential for naval warfare, particularly in anti-submarine operations. Experts believe the Z-20 will significantly enhance the Chinese navy's ability to detect and counter submarines, addressing a critical vulnerability in its defenses. The helicopter's advanced capabilities and potential deployment on various warships are raising concerns among regional rivals.
summary: China unveiled its advanced Z-20 helicopter at an air show, showcasing its potential for naval warfare, particularly in anti-submarine operations.  Experts believe the Z-20 will significantly enhance the Chinese navy's ability to detect and counter submarines, addressing a critical vulnerability in its defenses. The helicopter's advanced capabilities and potential deployment on various warships are raising concerns among regional rivals.

title: 'Horrific': New Zealand PM offers national apology to people abused in care
content: New Zealand's Prime Minister issued a historic apology for the abuse suffered by an estimated 200,000 children and vulnerable adults in state and religious care facilities over 70 years. The apology follows a six-year inquiry that revealed horrific physical, sexual, and psychological abuse, disproportionately impacting the Māori community.
summary: New Zealand's Prime Minister issued a historic apology for the abuse suffered by an estimated 200,000 children and vulnerable adults in state and religious care facilities over 70 years. The apology follows a six-year inquiry that revealed horrific physical, sexual, and psychological abuse, disproportionately impacting the Māori community.

title: Watch: Tens of thousands of students on bicycles spark traffic chaos chasing soup dumplings in China
content: Tens of thousands of university students in China participated in nighttime bike rides from Zhengzhou to Kaifeng to enjoy the city's famous soup dumplings. Fueled by social media, the 40-mile journeys became a social phenomenon, with students embracing the motto "youth is priceless." However, authorities implemented restrictions after the event's overwhelming popularity raised safety concerns, leading bike-sharing services to issue warnings and limit rides.
summary: Tens of thousands of university students in China participated in nighttime bike rides from Zhengzhou to Kaifeng to enjoy the city's famous soup dumplings.  Fueled by social media, the 40-mile journeys became a social phenomenon, with students embracing the motto "youth is priceless."  However, authorities implemented restrictions after the event's overwhelming popularity raised safety concerns, leading bike-sharing services to issue warnings and limit rides.

title: How Singles' Day in China evolved into one of world’s largest shopping event
content: China's Singles Day, the world's largest online shopping festival, concluded its longest-ever run with analysts predicting sales of up to $167 billion. Despite the potential increase, growth is slowing as consumers become more frugal amidst economic uncertainty. The focus has shifted from luxury items to necessities and household appliances, reflecting changing spending habits.
summary: China's Singles Day, the world's largest online shopping festival, concluded its longest-ever run with analysts predicting sales of up to $167 billion. Despite the potential increase, growth is slowing as consumers become more frugal amidst economic uncertainty.  The focus has shifted from luxury items to necessities and household appliances, reflecting changing spending habits.

title: 11 million children at risk: Unicef urges Pakistan government to act on hazardous air pollution
content: Unicef's representative in Pakistan issued a stark warning about the severe health risks posed by hazardous air quality in Punjab, impacting over 11 million children. The alarming pollution levels have prompted school closures and restrictions on public spaces.
summary: Unicef's representative in Pakistan issued a stark warning about the severe health risks posed by hazardous air quality in Punjab, impacting over 11 million children. The alarming pollution levels have prompted school closures and restrictions on public spaces.

title: Trump eyes Marco Rubio for secretary of state, say sources
content: Donald Trump is poised to name Senator Marco Rubio as his Secretary of State. If confirmed, Rubio would be the first Latino to hold the position. Rubio, known for his assertive foreign policy views, has aligned himself with Trump's vision for a more restrained international approach. The senator's stance on issues like Ukraine, China, and Cuba will be closely watched.
summary: Donald Trump is poised to name Senator Marco Rubio as his Secretary of State. If confirmed, Rubio would be the first Latino to hold the position.  Rubio, known for his assertive foreign policy views, has aligned himself with Trump's vision for a more restrained international approach. The senator's stance on issues like Ukraine, China, and Cuba will be closely watched.

title: Who's who in Trump’s new admin: Full list of key appointees
content: Donald Trump is assembling his administrative team, prioritizing immigration policy in his 2024 appointments. Key figures include Susie Wiles as chief of staff, Mike Waltz as national security adviser, and Tom Homan overseeing a large-scale deportation program as 'border czar'. Trump aims to address international challenges and promote American energy independence.
summary: Donald Trump is assembling his administrative team, prioritizing immigration policy in his 2024 appointments. Key figures include Susie Wiles as chief of staff, Mike Waltz as national security adviser, and Tom Homan overseeing a large-scale deportation program as 'border czar'.  Trump aims to address international challenges and promote American energy independence.

title: 'Canadians feel unsafe coming to Hindu temples': Brampton mandir cancels event
content: The Brampton Triveni Mandir cancelled a life certificate event due to threats of violent protests, following a similar disruption at another Hindu temple. The temple cited intelligence from Peel Regional Police and expressed concern for the safety of the Hindu community in Canada.
summary: The Brampton Triveni Mandir cancelled a life certificate event due to threats of violent protests, following a similar disruption at another Hindu temple. The temple cited intelligence from Peel Regional Police and expressed concern for the safety of the Hindu community in Canada.

title: Mujib’s portrait removed from Bangladesh's president office
content: Mahfuj Alam, a newly appointed advisor to Bangladesh's interim government, has sparked controversy by removing the portrait of Sheikh Mujibur Rahman, the nation's founding father, from the Banga Bhaban presidential palace. Critics condemn the act as a blatant display of disrespect towards the country's first president and its constitution, which mandates the display of Mujibur's portrait in government offices.
summary: Mahfuj Alam, a newly appointed advisor to Bangladesh's interim government, has sparked controversy by removing the portrait of Sheikh Mujibur Rahman, the nation's founding father, from the Banga Bhaban presidential palace. Critics condemn the act as a blatant display of disrespect towards the country's first president and its constitution, which mandates the display of Mujibur's portrait in government offices.

title: Anti-vaxxer gets 5-year jail for ‘encouraging terrorism’
content: Patrick Ruane, a 55-year-old British man, was sentenced to five years in prison for encouraging terrorism through social media posts. Ruane used the Telegram messaging app to incite violence against scientists, politicians, and public health officials involved in the Covid-19 vaccine rollout, even suggesting specific individuals as targets.
summary: Patrick Ruane, a 55-year-old British man, was sentenced to five years in prison for encouraging terrorism through social media posts. Ruane used the Telegram messaging app to incite violence against scientists, politicians, and public health officials involved in the Covid-19 vaccine rollout, even suggesting specific individuals as targets.

title: Israel’s military building along demilitarised zone in Syria, sat images show
content: Israel has commenced construction along the Alpha Line separating the Israeli-occupied Golan Heights from Syria, laying asphalt for a road and potentially violating the ceasefire by entering the demilitarized zone. The UN confirms Israeli troops' presence in the zone, raising concerns about potential escalation in the volatile region.
summary: Israel has commenced construction along the Alpha Line separating the Israeli-occupied Golan Heights from Syria, laying asphalt for a road and potentially violating the ceasefire by entering the demilitarized zone. The UN confirms Israeli troops' presence in the zone, raising concerns about potential escalation in the volatile region.

title: Donald Trump selects Mike Waltz as national security adviser, say reports
content: President-elect Donald Trump has selected Florida representative and former Army Green Beret Mike Waltz as his national security adviser. A staunch critic of China, Waltz has voiced concerns over Chinese activities in the Asia-Pacific region and emphasised bolstering US military preparedness. The former National Guard colonel, will play a key role in shaping national security strategy and coordinating inter-agency efforts.
summary: President-elect Donald Trump has selected Florida representative and former Army Green Beret Mike Waltz as his national security adviser. A staunch critic of China, Waltz has voiced concerns over Chinese activities in the Asia-Pacific region and emphasised bolstering US military preparedness. The former National Guard colonel, will play a key role in shaping national security strategy and coordinating inter-agency efforts.

title: Night bike rides began over dumplings. Now, China is clamping down on them
content: Tens of thousands of cyclists in China embarked on nightly rides between Zhengzhou and Kaifeng, turning the highway into a rolling street festival. What began as a spontaneous adventure, fueled by social media and celebrated as youthful energy, was swiftly shut down by authorities citing traffic and safety concerns as the crowds swelled.
summary: Tens of thousands of cyclists in China embarked on nightly rides between Zhengzhou and Kaifeng, turning the highway into a rolling street festival.  What began as a spontaneous adventure, fueled by social media and celebrated as youthful energy, was swiftly shut down by authorities citing traffic and safety concerns as the crowds swelled.

title: Suspected shooter, 4 others found dead across 3 Kansas homes: Police
content: Five men were found fatally shot across three residences in a connected incident. Police Chief Joe Sullivan confirmed the suspected shooter is among the deceased. The victims, aged 39 to 68, knew each other, but their relationships remain undisclosed. Authorities discovered the bodies after responding to a shooting report, with one victim found at the initial residence and three more at a nearby location.
summary: Five men were found fatally shot across three residences in a connected incident. Police Chief Joe Sullivan confirmed the suspected shooter is among the deceased. The victims, aged 39 to 68, knew each other, but their relationships remain undisclosed. Authorities discovered the bodies after responding to a shooting report, with one victim found at the initial residence and three more at a nearby location.

title: Spirit Airline flight from Florida hit by gunfire in Haiti, diverted to Santiago
content: A Spirit Airlines flight from Florida to Haiti was struck by gunfire during landing, injuring a flight attendant. The plane safely diverted to the Dominican Republic. Spirit Airlines suspended its Haiti service, and American Airlines halted flights between Miami and Port-au-Prince. The gunfire incident comes as Haiti is prepared to swear in a new prime minister amid a new power struggle that threatens to plunge the impoverished, crisis-wracked nation into fresh chaos.
summary: A Spirit Airlines flight from Florida to Haiti was struck by gunfire during landing, injuring a flight attendant. The plane safely diverted to the Dominican Republic. Spirit Airlines suspended its Haiti service, and American Airlines halted flights between Miami and Port-au-Prince. The gunfire incident comes as Haiti is prepared to swear in a new prime minister amid a new power struggle that threatens to plunge the impoverished, crisis-wracked nation into fresh chaos.
